text: Cardiac Big 5? \ Yes Refer to No cardiology Met > 9 / rt tolerance \ 4-8METor Investigate DASI <34 cause <300 mg/l/ NT-ProBNP \ >900 mg/L Groor Echocardiography Proceed if non-optimisable 300900 mg/L Consider less invasive procedure Consider regional anaesthesia Consider post-op Troponin Post op ICU/High Care Proceed Consider High Care post-op monitoring Optimise risk factors
